-- by QuantumSama -- creates a defensive orb
local r = game:service("RunService") local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
sword = script.Parent.Handle Tool = script.Parent
local damage = 12
local default_damage = 12 local slash_damage = 19 local lunge_damage = 40 --also projectile damage
local orbHP = 12 local orbRegen = 12 local orb = nil local lastOrbTime = 0
local lungeAnim = nil
function makeLargeOrb() if r.Stepped:wait() - lastOrbTime < orbRegen then return end if orb then orb:Destroy() end lastOrbTime = r.Stepped:wait() local orbHealth = orbHP orb = Instance.new("Part") orb.FormFactor = "Symmetric" orb.Shape = "Ball" orb.Size = Vector3.new(20,20,20) orb.Transparency = .8 orb.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") local loacation = CFrame.new(sword.Position) orb.CFrame = loacation orb.Anchored = true orb.CanCollide = false orb.BottomSurface = "Smooth" orb.TopSurface = "Smooth" orb.Touched:connect(function(hit) print("TouchedA") if hit == nil or (hit.Parent == nil) or hit.Anchored == true then return end if Tool == nil or Tool.Parent == nil or hit:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character print("TouchedB") if hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then print("TouchedC") orbHealth = orbHealth - 1 local vec = hit.Position - orb.Position hit.Velocity = vec.unit * (hit.Velocity.magnitude + 10) orb.Transparency = .6 if orbHealth == 0 then orb:Destroy() end wait(.1) if orb then orb.Transparency = .8 end end end end end) debris:AddItem(orb,8) orb.Parent = game.Workspace --for i = 1, 40 do -- orb.Size = Vector3.new(i/2,i/2,i/2) -- orb.CFrame = loacation -- wait(.1) --end sword.Sparkles.Enabled = false wait(orbRegen) sword.Sparkles.Enabled = true end
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = sword SlashSound.Volume = .7
local LungeSound = Instance.new("Sound") LungeSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\swordlunge.wav" LungeSound.Parent = sword LungeSound.Volume = .6
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = sword UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
function blow(hit) if (hit.Parent == nil) then return end -- happens when bullet hits sword
local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end
function fire(v, part)
local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter)
local missile = Instance.new("Part")
local PewPew = Tool.Handle:FindFirstChild("PewPew")
if (PewPew == nil) then PewPew = Instance.new("Sound") PewPew.Name = "PewPew" PewPew.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=22968437" --PewPew.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=13510352" PewPew.Parent = Tool.Handle PewPew.Pitch = 1 --.85 PewPew.Volume = .85 end
missile.CFrame = part.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.pi/2,0,0) missile.Size = Vector3.new(1,1,1) missile.Velocity = v.unit * 300 missile.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Camo") missile.Transparency = .5 missile.Shape = 0 missile.BottomSurface = 0 missile.TopSurface = 0 missile.CanCollide = false print(missile.CanCollide) missile.Material = Enum.Material.CorrodedMetal missile.Elasticity = .05 missile.Friction = .7 missile.Name = "Bullet"
missile.Touched:connect(blow)
local mesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(.3,10,.3) --mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0,1,0) mesh.Parent = missile
local force = Instance.new("BodyForce") force.Name = "BulletFloat" force.force = Vector3.new(0,98.1,0) force.Parent = missile
debris:AddItem(missile,5) missile.Parent = game.Workspace
PewPew:Play()
end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
local lunging = false
--function lunge() -- lunging = true -- wait(.75) -- lunging = false --end
function doLunge() print("lunging") --makeLargeOrb() damage = lunge_damage
LungeSound:play()
--local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") --anim.Name = "toolanim" --anim.Value = "Lunge" --anim.Parent = Tool lungeAnim:Play()
--force = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") --force.velocity = Vector3.new(0,10,0) --Tool.Parent.Torso.CFrame.lookVector * 80 --force.Parent = Tool.Parent.Torso --wait(.25) swordOut() wait(.25) fire(-sword.CFrame.lookVector, sword) wait(.25) --force.Parent = nil --wait(.5) swordUp()
lunging = false end
function attack() --if lunging then return end
damage = slash_damage SlashSound:play() local anim = Instance.new("StringValue") anim.Name = "toolanim" anim.Value = "Slash" anim.Parent = Tool wait(.2) if lunging then doLunge() end damage = default_damage end
function swordUp() Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(-1,0,0) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(0,0,1) end
function swordOut() local initTime = tick() local time = tick() local duration = .25 local initGrip = Tool.Grip while (time - initTime) < duration do --local frames =5 for i = 1, frames do time = tick() Tool.Grip = initGrip * CFrame.Angles( (time - initTime)/duration * math.pi/2,0,0) wait() end
Tool.GripForward = Vector3.new(0,0,-1) Tool.GripRight = Vector3.new(0,1,0) Tool.GripUp = Vector3.new(1,0,0) wait(.25) end
function swordAcross() -- parry end
Tool.Enabled = true local last_attack = r.Stepped:wait() - .2 local t = 0
function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then
t = r.Stepped:wait() if (t - last_attack < .2) then print("Lunging on") lunging = true end return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
t = r.Stepped:wait() last_attack = t --if (t - last_attack < .2) then -- lunge() --else lunging = false attack() --end
--wait(.5)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() UnsheathSound:play() local vCharacter = Tool.Parent local humanoid = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then lungeAnim = humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Lunge) else print("humanoid error") end end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.ChildAdded:connect(function(child) if child:IsA("StringValue") and child.Name == "KeyPress" and child.Value == "q" then child:Destroy() makeLargeOrb() end end)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)

local Tool = script.Parent;
enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end
enabled = false mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png"
wait(.5) mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" enabled = true
end
function onKeyDown( key ) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then local sv = Instance.new("StringValue") sv.Value = "q" sv.Name = "KeyPress" sv.Parent = script.Parent:FindFirstChild("SwordScript") end end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse)
if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end
mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() onButton1Down(mouse) end) mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal()
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)
